meaning_str.bing:
n. 仆人；用人；（公司或机构的）雇员；奴仆般受制（或献身）于…的人
网络. 佣人；从者；雇工

仆人；用人；（公司或机构的）雇员；奴仆般受制（或献身）于…的人

仆人；佣人；奴仆；奴隶；雇员；职员；献身…的人；受…指引的人

1.en: The composer said that the devil had appeared to him in dream in 1713 and offered to become his servant.
1.cn: 作者说：魔鬼撒旦在1713年出现在他的梦里，并且自愿要担任他的仆人，为他服务。

2.en: a servant that this does not need to spend what, let him in. . .
2.cn: 仆人觉得这样没有损失什么，就让他进来了。

3.en: Once, late at night, an Englishman came out of his room into the corridor of a hotel and asked the servant to bring him a glass of water.
3.cn: 从前，深夜，一个英国男人走出他的房间来到了旅馆的走廊并问服务员要一杯水。

0.en: This family simply wanted a cheap servant.
0.cn: 这户人家只想要个廉价仆人。

1.en: Even the cook, the one who sweeps steps or a masterful servant can have Kung Fu.
1.cn: 甚至是厨师，打扫的杂役或是干活熟练的仆人，都可以拥有功夫。

2.en: So that you or a servant can keep watch. Then we'll have time to investigate the loss of the knife.
2.cn: 这样您或者哪个仆人能盯着点，这样我们也有时间来调查刀丢失的事了。

3.en: Ooh-la. Cinderella at the ball! No one wants a servant for a bride. After all I've done…
3.cn: 哎呦。灰姑娘要去舞会了，没人想娶一个仆人当新娘的。我都那么做了，你还是……

4.en: You've probably thought of this, but I'd place someone, maybe a servant, in each room the public will enter. Just to keep an eye on things.
4.cn: 你们可能已经想到了，但建议找个人或许找个仆人，安置在每间对外开放的房间里，好盯着点。

5.en: Oh, I'll get her. I thought Raj was helping you out. No, he had to work. Plus, he has a quota for the amount of Indian servant jokes he can tolerate, and, apparently, I filled it.
5.cn: 我去哄她吧。我以为拉杰会来帮手呢。没来，他得上班。再说了，关于印度仆人的玩笑他的容忍是有限的，而我貌似已经把额度用完了。

6.en: Kaidu seeks to ensure your safety. I'm your servant.
6.cn: 海都想确保您的安全，我任您差遣。

7.en: Hear. To a peck of dirt. Hear. I will drink to that, but I will also drink to the general, a good servant. To the general.
7.cn: 说得好。敬黄土。说得好。我要敬这一杯，也要敬将军一杯他是位优秀的公仆。敬将军。

8.en: It would ruin their prospects to be seen arriving with a ragged servant girl. Because that is what you are. And that is what you will always be.
8.cn: 要是她们被人看见和一个穿着破衣服的女仆一起出现一切就都毁了。这才是你的身份，这也永远是你的身份。

9.en: No one will believe you, a dirty servant girl without a family, if you lay claim to the prince's heart. But with a respectable gentlewoman to put you forward, you will not be ignored.
9.cn: 没人会相信你，一个没有家人的肮脏女仆，若你自称是王子的心上人。但若一个贵妇人举荐你的话，就不会有人忽视。
